fullplot: Set in ancient China, Zeng Jing is a skilled assassin who finds herself in possession of a mystical Buddhist monk's remains. She begins a quest to return the remains to its rightful resting place, and thus places herself in mortal danger because a team of assassins is in a deadly pursuit to possess the remains which holds an ancient power-wielding secret.
plot: Drizzle/Zeng Jing tries to start a new life after she had betrayed her gang and hid the remains of monk.
title: Reign of Assassins
